00003 #include <algorithm>
00004 #include <iterator>
00005 #include <string>
00006 #include <string.h>
00007 #include <sys/types.h>
00008 #include <sys/socket.h>
00009 #include <netinet/in.h>
00010 #include <arpa/inet.h>
00011 #include <boost/lexical_cast.hpp>
00012 #include "Error.hpp"
00013 #include "TCPSocket.hpp"
00014 #include "IPAddress.hpp"
00015 using ntee::Socket;
00016 using ntee::TCPSocket;
00017 
00018 static int send( int sock, int nb )
00019 {
00020    static char buf[16384];
00021    if ( buf[0] == 0 )
00022       memset( buf, 'X', sizeof(buf));
00023       
00024    if ( nb > 16384 ) nb=16384; 
00025    std::cout << "sending: " << nb << "\n";     
00026    return send( sock, buf, nb, 0 );
00027 }
00028 
00029 static int recv( int sock )
00030 {
00031    size_t msg = 0;
00032    SysErrIf( recv( sock, &msg, sizeof(msg), 0 ) == -1 );
00033    msg = ntohl(msg); 
00034    std::cout << "recv: " << msg << "\n";
00035    return msg;
00036 }
00037 
00038 
00046 int main(int argc, char** argv)
00047 {
00048    // echo the command line
00049    std::cout << "testCli started command:\n\t";
00050    std::copy(argv, &argv[argc], std::ostream_iterator<char*>(std::cout, " "));
00051    std::cout << "\n";
00052    
00053    std::string USAGE("Usage: testCli <server ip addr> <server port> [N pings=10]\n");
00054    ErrIf( argc < 3 ).info(USAGE);
00055 
00056    //** Get the server address, port and maxPings arguments
00057    std::string serverIP( argv[1] );
00058    
00059    in_port_t port;
00060    ErrIfCatch(boost::bad_lexical_cast,
00061               port = boost::lexical_cast<in_port_t>( argv[2] ))
00062              .info("%s is not a port number!\n",argv[2]);
00063    
00064    
00065    // Get the last (optional) argument which is the number of times to send to the
00066    // server. Default to 10.
00067    int maxPings = 10;
00068    if ( argc > 3 ) {
00069       ErrIfCatch( boost::bad_lexical_cast,
00070                   maxPings=boost::lexical_cast<int>(argv[3]))
00071                .info("Couldn't convert num of pings arg: '%s' to an int\n", argv[3]);
00072    }
00073 
00074 
00075    
00076    //** Connect to the server
00077    Socket* sock = new TCPSocket("Cli");
00078    IPAddress ipaddr( serverIP.c_str(), port );
00079    SysErrIf( sock->connectTo(ipaddr) == -1 );
00080    
00081    //** Send maxPing messages to the server, each progressively longer then the last
00082    const int MAX_RETRY = 3;
00083    int pingCnt = 0;
00084    while( pingCnt < maxPings ) {
00085       
00086       int snb=0;
00087       int rnb=0;
00088       int resend = 0;
00089       do {
00090          SysErrIf( (snb = send( sock->getFD(), 1<<pingCnt )) == -1 );
00091          SysErrIf( (rnb = recv( sock->getFD() )) == -1 );
00092       } while( resend++ < MAX_RETRY && rnb != snb );
00093       ErrIf( resend == MAX_RETRY )
00094          .info("Unable to checksum last packet, %d sent != %d recv\n",snb,rnb);
00095          
00096       ++pingCnt; 
00097    }
00098    
00099    return 0;
00100 }
